/home/qq/coen/bin/nv/bin/mpifort -O2 -DPGI -Mbackslash -Mpreprocess -i8 -acc -Minfo=accel -Mcuda=rdc -DCUDA -DACC -DCUDA -DCUSOLVER -lcusolver -DCUSOLVER -DCUSOLVERJ -lcusolver -DLINUX -O2 CMakeFiles/merge_xyz.dir/aux/merge_xyz/merge_xyz.f.o -o bin/merge_xyz   -L/opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/mkl/lib/intel64  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/mkl/lib/intel64:/opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/compiler/lib/intel64: lib/libgnome.a lib/libinp.a lib/libutils.a -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_intel_thread -lmkl_core /opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/compiler/lib/intel64/libiomp5.so -lm -ldl -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_intel_thread -lmkl_core /opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/compiler/lib/intel64/libiomp5.so -lm -ldl -lm -ldl -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_intel_thread -lmkl_core /opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/compiler/lib/intel64/libiomp5.so -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_intel_thread -lmkl_core /opt/intel/composer_xe_2013.2.146/compiler/lib/intel64/libiomp5.so -lm -ldl
